title: Validate environment and run existing tests
description:
Before any code changes, verify the project is healthy:
1. Run npm run build - verify it passes
2. Run npm run lint - verify no errors
3. Run npm run dev - verify server starts
4. Check existing E2E tests if any

BLOCKING: Do not proceed if build or lint fails. EJECT with details.
acceptance_criteria: Build passes, lint passes, dev server starts
